strong.span: TDA Approves Student Curbside Meals March 17-20

span.style: background: white; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;
span.strong: We have been approved from TDA to serve curbside meals from the Elementary Campus.

strong.span: This service is for all children ages 1 year through 18 years old.
Breakfast serving times will be 8:00 am to 9:00 am and lunch 11:00 am to 1:00 pm.
Requirements are children MUST be in the car to receive a reimbursable meal. Adults cannot receive/purchase a meal per TDA guidelines.

span.style: background: white; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;
span.strong: Currently meal service will be Tuesday, March 17th through Friday, March 20th with plans to adjust per further notification.

span.style: background: white; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #000000;
span.strong: Reminder, please stay in your vehicle and meals will be delivered to you.

strong.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: large; background-color: #ffffff;

div.div:
Our Mission
The mission of Haskell CISD is to create a safe, nurturing community, empowering all students to reach their full potential and become responsible, productive citizens by providing opportunities for their success.

Haskell, Texas 79521-0937
